properties.value:
#Variable NameVariable IDVariable Description
1PX031401_Marijuana_Use_DepressedPX031401030100Because of your marijuana use, did you ever experience any of the following: Feeling depressed or uninterested in things for more than 24 hours to the point that it interfered with your functioning?
2PX031401_Marijuana_Use_Trouble_ConcentratingPX031401030200Because of your marijuana use, did you ever experience any of the following: Having trouble concentrating or having such trouble thinking clearly for more than 24 hours that it interfered with your functioning?
3PX031401_Marijuana_Use_ParanoidPX031401030300Because of your marijuana use, did you ever experience any of the following: Feeling paranoid or suspicious of people for more than 24 hours to the point that it interfered with your relationships?
4PX031401_Marijuana_Use_Decreased_ContactPX031401030400Because of your marijuana use, did you ever experience any of the following: Decreased contact with friends or family?
5PX031401_Marijuana_Use_HallucinationsPX031401030500Because of your marijuana use, did you ever experience any of the following: Hearing, seeing, or smelling things that weren't really there?

LOINC_NUM: 63649-8
COMPONENT: Problem, related to marijuana use, that occurred for more than 24H to the point that it interfered with functioning or relationships
PROPERTY: Find
TIME_ASPCT: Pt
SYSTEM: ^Patient
SCALE_TYP: Nom
METHOD_TYP: PhenX
STATUS: TRIAL
SHORTNAME: Problem marijuana > 24h PhenX
